articles.title: 'That's Aiden for you': Markram bucking conventional wisdom is welcome mystery for Proteas
articles.description: Aiden Markram has bucked conventional wisdom in becoming a middle-order stalwart in ODIs and opening the batting in Test cricket, successfully so.
articles.content: KOLKATA - To appreciate just how indispensable Aiden Markram is to this Proteas team, consider that he's been one of the few international batters to disdainfully throw conventional wisdom into the b… [+167 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
